Q1

Class Circle2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Q1.Circle2D

  • public class Circle2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic class for a 2-dimensions circle, provide simple functions to calculate some value of a circle. The coordinate of the circle is (x, y)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double radius 
      protected double x 
      protected double y
